start.text: Let's try our best and finish this job, so that everyone is safe~
Don't be so down, crew~ I'm sure we can do this well.
There's no need to worry~ If we all do what we can, we'll make it.
It's not a good idea for us to overwork ourselves~

start_boss.text: We could lose everything if we hesitate.
Sometimes, you'll have to get bold in order to overcome some things.

retreat.text: I don't want anyone to die here. Retreating.
I'll retreat. Let's not make any more meaningless casualties.
That's it for me, then~ I'll take my leave.

out_of_missiles.text: We've run out of missiles. I'm sure we put them to good use~
It's time to change our tactics~ That was our last missile.

engaged.text: It's a great shame, all of that technology wasted on weapons.
If only we could have followed a noble path together~
If there's a meaning to this fight, we'll give it our best.

need_help.text: We're in a bit of a situation~ I'd appreciate your help.
This might be a little too much for us~

pursuing.text: Sometimes, you'll have to get bold in order to protect something.
Good work, crew~ They're on the run, now.
Well done~ Let's take our time and get things done.

running.text: We need to step back for a moment~
There's no need to fret, we'll be back soon enough~

hull_90.text: We've taken damage. Let's try to avoid any meaningless losses.
There's nothing to be afraid of, for now.

hull_50.text: We can make it through if we try.
There's no reason to be afraid, crew.
Try your best to make sure everyone's safe...

hull_30.text: This may be too much for us...
I don't want any of us to die here.

overload.text: We've overloaded. We need to try harder to minimize the damage.
There's no need to fret. I believe we can still do this.

death.text: I guess this is as far as I can go...
Was this... Just too much for me?

victory.text: How about a nice cup of coffee for all~?
I'm glad we could finish this~

victory_boss.text: See? We can make it through if we try. Good work, everyone~
